item.title: What is comprehensible input? Here's what language learners need to know
item.description: Comprehensible input is anything in your target language hat you can mostly understand. And research shows it’s the key to language acquisition.

item.title: Science of Language: Newborns learn speech sounds using same brain regions as adults
item.description: A new study found that newborns start recognizing vowel sounds just hours after birth using a speech-processing system very similar to the one adults use to learn and use language
